Sis
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#ffb1f8}Hey, need something? {/color}{/font}

You approach {color=#CD5C5C}{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}Stephanie{/font}{/color}
and chat for a little bit.

Stephanie
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#cd5c5c}Hey Alpaca, what's up? {/color}{/font}

Alpaca
{color=#CD5C5C}{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}Stephanie{/font}{/color}, now that
you've had some time to get used to the lab there is something I want to talk
to you about.

Stephanie
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#cd5c5c}Sure, what can I help you with?
{/color}{/font}

Alpaca
Our R&D up to this point has been based on the notes you and I have from our
days at the lab.

Alpaca
Remember how some of the effects we saw were enhanced by sexual arousal?

{color=#CD5C5C}{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}Stephanie{/font}{/color} nods her
understanding.

Stephanie
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#cd5c5c}Our data did indicate that, yes.
{color=#dddddd}{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}Nora{/font}{/color}'s hypothesis was
that an orgasm opened up chemical receptors that were normally unavailable.
{/color}{/font}

Alpaca
What else can we do if we assume that is true? Does that open up any more
research paths?

Stephanie
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#cd5c5c}If it's true it might give us a way to
induce greater effects in the recipients. {/color}{/font}

{color=#CD5C5C}{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}Your friend{/font}{/color} thinks for
a long moment, then smiles mischievously.

Stephanie
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#cd5c5c}But we'll need to do some experiments
to be sure. {/color}{/font}

Alpaca
What sort of experiments?

Stephanie
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#cd5c5c}I want to take a dose of serum myself,
and you can record the effects. {/color}{/font}

Stephanie
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#cd5c5c}Then I'll make myself cu... induce a
climax, and we can compare the effects after. {/color}{/font}

Alpaca
Do you think that's a good idea?

Stephanie
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#cd5c5c}Self experimentation with prototype
drugs? I don't see how it could go wrong! {/color}{/font}

Stephanie
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#cd5c5c}Come on Alpaca, this is the stuff
{color=#dddddd}{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}Nora{/font}{/color} would never let me
do! It's a chance to be at the bleeding edge of science! {/color}{/font}

Alpaca
Alright, what do we need?

Stephanie
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#cd5c5c}A finished dose of serum that raises
my Suggestibility. The higher it gets my Suggestibility the better, but any
amount should do. {/color}{/font}

Stephanie
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#cd5c5c}Then we'll just need some time and
some privacy for me to see what sort of effects my orgasms will have.
{/color}{/font}

Choice: Run the Experiment
Choice: Run the Experiment later

Player chose: Run the Experiment

Alpaca
Okay, I'm ready to start.

Stephanie
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#cd5c5c}Do you have the serum? {/color}{/font}

Alpaca
Yeah, I have it right here.

You hand the vial of serum to
{color=#CD5C5C}{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}Stephanie{/font}{/color}. She swirls
it in front of her eye and nods.

You prepare a notepad and a pen to take notes, and
{color=#CD5C5C}{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}your friend{/font}{/color} uncorks the
vial.

Stephanie
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#cd5c5c}Here we go! {/color}{/font}

She drinks it down in one smooth motion.

Alpaca
Okay, let's start with some initial questions...

You lead {color=#CD5C5C}{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}Stephanie{/font}{/color}
through a series of questions to establish a baseline for the current effects.

Alpaca
... Good, that's the last question. Now on to phase two.

Stephanie
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#cd5c5c}Okay... Wow, this is making me more
nervous than I was expecting! {/color}{/font}

Alpaca
Serums suddenly got much more effective if the test subject had an orgasm

Nora
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#dddddd}Inside the folder is a design spec for

However, the company has had limited success in their trials. {/color}{/font}

Nora
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#dddddd}My understanding is that they have

Nora
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#dddddd}However, when I was running through
the design specifications, something about it just didn't seem right. I
thought maybe you could take a look at it. At your leisure, anyway.

addresses you politely.

She leads you deeper into the store towards rows of sleek high definition
monitors displaying grainy footage captured both indoors and outdoors - all
designed specifically for keeping tabs on potential threats day or night.

As she rambles about camera angles, resolution quality and price range, you
find yourself becoming increasingly distracted by thoughts not related to
security anymore...

Alpaca
And how about something smaller? Something less conspicuous perhaps?

The girl bites her lower lip cutely before nodding knowingly and glancing
around nervously.

Marie
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#00ff00}We do carry some covert models which
aren't immediately recognisable as cameras, some people enjoy using them
for... different reasons. {/color}{/font}

Marie
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#00ff00}What kind of environment will it be
used in primarily? {/color}{/font}

Alpaca
Probably inside.

Marie
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#00ff00}There are different types depending on
light conditions, noise levels... even whether there'll be any liquids
involved during recording sessions. {/color}{/font}

She seems very knowledgeable, mentioning how certain colours blend better
against fabric backgrounds or emphasizing waterproof capabilities when
discussing bathroom/shower settings.

Her eagerness is palpable, revealing more about her character than she
probably intended.

Alpaca
What if something were to happen unexpectedly late at night when everyone else
is asleep? Do you have something that would capture everything clearly
regardless?

Marie
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#00ff00}Y-yes definitely! We offer several
infrared models perfect for low-light situations like that. {/color}{/font}

Alpaca
That sounds great, do they record sound too?

Her cheeks turn bright red now and she stammers slightly before recovering
gracefully.

Marie
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#00ff00}Yes, most modern ones do, some even
come equipped with microphones capable of picking up whispers from across the
room. {/color}{/font}

Alpaca
Anything else I should know?

Marie
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#00ff00}You could also look into motion
sensors. They send alerts directly to your phone whenever movement is
detected, allowing you complete peace of mind even when you're not physically
present. {/color}{/font}

Alpaca
Wow, that sounds incredible, I didn't realise there were so many options.

Her eyes flicker down and back up quickly, betraying her excitement.

Marie
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#00ff00}Of course! To truly maximize your
investment though, you may want a DVR recorder for storage capacity and
continuous recording capability. {/color}{/font}

Alpaca
These devices really are impressive, how much would this setup cost?

Marie
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#00ff00}It can vary quite a bit depending on
brand and model. But... {/color}{/font}

She leans close, continuing suggestively.

Marie
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#00ff00}If money isn't an issue... we could
put together a custom package tailored exactly to your desires.
{/color}{/font}

Choice: Make it happen
{color=#ff0000}{size=18}Costs: $1000{/size}{/color}
Choice: Not now

Player chose: Not now

Alpaca

I've got some other stuff going on.

Marie
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#00ff00}I understand. I'll be here if you
change your mind. {/color}{/font}

She hands you a business card adorned with contact info including her name and
social media handles, and a site dedicated to promoting these products online.

Marie
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#00ff00}Don't forget us when making future
decisions regarding privacy matters! {/color}{/font}

You decide to wander aimlessly around the mall for a bit. You do a bit of
people watching and generally enjoy the time to yourself.

As you walk around, you spot a kiosk that catches your attention.

Lifestyle Coaches: We help you set and achieve long term and short term goals!

You walk around the kiosk a bit, there are all kinds of testimonials and
adverts up for the service.

Camila

{color=#DAA520}{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}Camila{/font}{/color}. {/color}{/font}

Alpaca
I'm Alpaca.

Camila

coach, here to help people achieve their dreams! {/color}{/font}

The sales pitch is a little... optimistic? But to be honest, she is pretty
good-looking, so you decide to let her continue.

Camila
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#daa520}I've personally helped all kinds of
people achieve all kinds of things, from giving up drugs, to losing a few
{weight_system}! {/color}{/font}

Camila
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#daa520}Our first consultation is free. Would
you be interested? {/color}{/font}

What the hell. It couldn't hurt anything, right?

Alpaca
I suppose.

Sure.

tomorrow.

You are just drifting off to sleep when you suddenly remember you don't have
any clean clothes for tomorrow!

You look at the clock. It is already pretty late.

You guess that your family is already asleep, so you grab your laundry and
take it to the laundry room just wearing your boxers.

You throw your laundry in the washing machine, add some detergent and start it
up.

runs and you move your clothes to the dryer, you notice a laundry basket on
the floor filled with clean, folded clothes.

the laundry is a pair of sexy black panties.

You feel your cock stir when you think about the ass those panties cover.

fantasizing about that...

Choice: Find something else to do

Player chose: Find something else to do

You decide to do something else. You head back to room and hop on your PC,
doing work related tasks until the washer is done.

While you are working on researching business methods, you accidentally get
caught up in a clickbait "10 ways to increase your bottom-line" item on some
random economics website.

Most of the info is garbage, but one of them actually makes sense for you to
use. You make note of the method and decide to institute it at your business.

You go back to swap your laundry to the dryer.

{color=#FFB1F8}{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}Sis{/font}{/color} is just coming out
of the laundry room with her laundry basket.

{color=#FFB1F8}{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}Sis{/font}{/color} and then swap your
clothes from the washer to the dryer. They should be dry in the morning!

techniques and producing 28.8 research points.

company first.

being researched, exactly? {/color}{/font}

You decide to just be honest. If she is going to be working here at the
company, she is going to figure it out sooner or later anyway.

Alpaca
Well, most of our research right now is targeted toward making people's lives
better.

Alpaca
We came across a formula not long ago with almost no known side effects, that
with tweaks to the final formula can be used for a number of different things,
from increasing happiness to increasing charisma, to making sex better.

stove and looks back at you when you come into the room.

Mom
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#8fff66}The food's almost ready. Just take a
seat and I'll make you a plate. {/color}{/font}

Alpaca
Thanks Mom, I didn't realise how hungry I was. Nerves, I guess.

Mom
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#8fff66}Don't worry, I'm sure they'll love
you. {/color}{/font}

She turns back and focuses her attention on her cooking. A few minutes later
she presents you with a plate.

Mom
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#8fff66}Here you go sweetheart. You look very
sharp in your suit, by the way. My little boy is all grown up. {/color}{/font}

You eat quickly, keeping a sharp eye on the time. When you're done you stand
up and move to the front door again.

Alpaca
Okay, I've got to go if I'm going to catch my bus. I'll talk to you later and
let you know how it goes.

Mom
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#8fff66}Wait. {/color}{/font}

Mom follows you to the front door. She straightens your tie and brushes some
lint off of your shoulder.

Mom
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#8fff66}Oh, I should have ironed this for you.
{/color}{/font}

Alpaca
It's fine, Mom. Really.

Mom
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#8fff66}I know, I know, I'll stop fussing.
Good luck sweety. {/color}{/font}

She wraps her arms around you and gives you a tight hug. You hug her back then
hurry out the door.

It takes an hour on public transit then a short walk to find the building.
It's a small single level office attached to a slightly larger warehouse style
building.

You pull on the door handle. It thunks loudly—it's locked. You try the other
one and get the same result.

Alpaca
Hello?

You pull on the locked door again, then take a step back and look around for
another entrance you might have missed. You don't see any.

You get your phone out and call the contact number you were given a few days
earlier. It goes immediately to a generic voice mail system.

With nothing left to do you give up and turn around. Suddenly there's a click
and the front door to the office swings open.

Janitor
Hey, who's making all that noise?

A middle–aged man is standing at the door wearing grey-brown overalls. He's
holding a stack of papers in one hand and a tape gun in the other.

Alpaca
That was me. I'm supposed to be here for a job interview, do you know where I
should be going?

Janitor
Well I think you're shit out of luck then. They went belly up yesterday. This
place belongs to the bank now.

Alpaca
What? That can't be right, I was talking to them less than a week ago.

Janitor
Here, take a look for yourself.

The man, who you assume is a janitor of some sort, hands you one of the sheets
of paper he's holding.

It features a picture of the building along with an address matching the one
you were given and a large "FORECLOSED" label along the top.

The janitor turns around and holds a page up to the front door, then sticks it
in place with tape around all four edges.

Janitor
They must have been neck deep in debt, if that makes you feel better about not
working for 'em.

Janitor
They left all their science stuff behind; must've been worth less than the
debt they're ditching.

Alpaca
So everything's still in there?

Janitor
Seems like it. Bank doesn't know where to sell it and didn't want me to
warehouse it, so it goes with the property.

You look back at the foreclosure notice and read until you see the listing
price.

The price on the unit is expensive, but an order of magnitude less than what
you would have expected a fully stocked lab to be worth.

Alpaca
Would you mind if I take a quick look around? I promise I won't be long.

The janitor gives you a stern look, judging your character, then nods and
opens the door.

Janitor
I'm just about done tidying this place up so the bank can sell it. If you can
be in and out in five minutes you can look around.

Alpaca
Thank you, I'll be quick.

You step inside the building and take a walk around.

The main office building contains a small lab, much like the one you worked at
while you were in university, suitable for research and development tasks.

The connected warehouse space has a basic chemical production line installed.
The machines are all off-brand but seem functional.

At the back of the building is a loading dock for shipping and receiving
materials.

While you're exploring you hear the janitor yell from across the building.

Janitor
I need to be heading off. Are ya done in there?

Alpaca
Yeah, I'm done. Thanks again.

The janitor locks the door when you leave. You get on a bus heading home and
do some research on the way.

You look up the price of some of the pieces of equipment you saw and confirm
your suspicion. The bank has no idea how valuable the property really is.

Three days later...

{color=#8fff66}{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}Your mother{/font}{/color} looks over
the paperwork you've laid out. Property cost, equipment value, and potential
earnings are all listed.

Mom
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#8fff66}And you've checked all the numbers?
{/color}{/font}

Alpaca
Three times.

Mom
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#8fff66}It's just... this is a lot of money
Sweetheart. I would need to take a second mortgage out on the house.
{/color}{/font}

Alpaca
And I'll be able to pay for that. This is the chance of a lifetime, Mom.

Mom
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#8fff66}What was it you said you were going to
make again? {/color}{/font}

Alpaca
When I was working at the lab last summer we developed some prototype chemical
carriers. I think they have huge commercial potential.

Alpaca
And there's no regulation around them yet, because they're so new. I can start
production and be selling them tomorrow.

{color=#8fff66}{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}Your mother{/font}{/color} leans back
in her chair and pinches the brow of her nose.

Mom
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#8fff66}Okay, you've convinced me. I'll get in
touch with the bank and put a loan on the house. {/color}{/font}

You jump up and throw your arms around
{color=#8fff66}{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}your mother{/font}{/color}. She laughs
and hugs you back.

Sis
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#ffb1f8}What's going on? {/color}{/font}

{color=#FFB1F8}{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}Your sister{/font}{/color} steps into
the doorway and looks at you both.

Mom

I'm his first investor. {/color}{/font}

Sis
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#ffb1f8}Is that what you've been excited about
the last couple days? What are you actually making? {/color}{/font}

Alpaca
I'll have to tell you more about it later Lily, I've got some calls to make.
Thanks Mom, you're the best!

You leave {color=#8fff66}{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}your mother{/font}{/color}
and {color=#FFB1F8}{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}your sister{/font}{/color} in the
kitchen to talk. You retreat to your room for some privacy.

You can manage the machinery of the lab, but you're going to need help
refining the serum design from last year. You think back to your old lab job.

The antics you had at the lab with
{color=#dddddd}{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}Nora{/font}{/color} and
{color=#CD5C5C}{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}Stephanie{/font}{/color} were great,
but after so long without being dosed with your serum, you doubt you could
convince them...

On your dresser, a small blue vial catches your eye. Your last vial of Blue
Serum.

A desperate plan forms in your head. Maybe, just maybe, you could convince
{color=#dddddd}{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}Nora{/font}{/color} to quit her job at
the university and run YOUR research department.

If you had thought about it longer, you probably would have stopped yourself,
but with the financials already worked out, desperation forces your hand.

You pick up your phone and call
{color=#dddddd}{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}Nora{/font}{/color}.

Nora
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#dddddd}Hello? {/color}{/font}

Alpaca
{color=#dddddd}{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}Nora{/font}{/color}, this is Alpaca.

Nora
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#dddddd}Alpaca. Is there a reason a former
pupil is calling me? {/color}{/font}

Alpaca
I'd like to talk to you about a business offer. Any chance we could meet
somewhere?

Nora
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#dddddd}Alpaca, whatever hair brained MLM
scheme you've concocted isn't worth... {/color}{/font}

Alpaca
No no no, it isn't anything like that. I'm working on a pharmaceutical
project.

There are several seconds of silence on the line.

Nora
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#dddddd}I can't believe I am about to say

{color=#dddddd}{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}Nora{/font}{/color} sends you the

Nora
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#dddddd}I have other plans for the evening, so
I can give you ten minutes. Got it? {/color}{/font}

Alpaca
I'll meet you there.

You hang up the phone. You suddenly aren't so sure this is a good idea...

It takes you an hour to get your pitch prepared and to get over to the bar.

When you arrive {color=#dddddd}{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}your old
boss{/font}{/color} is sitting at a booth near the back. She nods when you see
each other.

You quickly point to the bar to indicate you are getting drinks. She rolls her
eyes, then nods.

You order a beer and a blue lagoon. While waiting for the drinks, you look
over and notice that
{color=#dddddd}{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}Nora{/font}{/color} is watching you
intently.

You had hoped you could get here before her. This is really starting to make
you nervous.

The bartender sets your drinks on the counter and you quickly pay for them. In
your pocket, you take off the cap to the vial of serum.

Doing your best to conceal it, you turn your back to
{color=#dddddd}{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}your old boss{/font}{/color} for a
second... and quietly splash the serum into the fruity drink. It dissolves
quickly.

You take the drinks over to the table, setting the blue lagoon in front of
{color=#dddddd}{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}Nora{/font}{/color}.

Alpaca
Hey {color=#dddddd}{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}Nora{/font}{/color}, it's great to

Nora
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#dddddd}Yes, I'm sure it is. Your ten minutes
started when you walked in, and you are down to eight. {/color}{/font}

Alpaca
Ohhhh don't be like that.

You take a seat across from her and take a sip of your drink. She doesn't
touch the drink you put in front of her.

You try to break the ice a bit with some small talk.

Alpaca
So, how are things going at the university?

Nora
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#dddddd}Small talk? Really? Is that what

That's right, {color=#dddddd}{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}your old
boss{/font}{/color} isn't the type for small talk.

You try to switch tactics.

Alpaca

She sighs and shakes her head.

Nora
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#dddddd}Flirting now? Your words are empty
Alpaca. Tell me why you've really asked me here. I don't have time for games.

Nora
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#dddddd}Does it have something to do with

She points to her drink.

Nora
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#dddddd}Some kind of date rape drug? Is that

Alpaca
Whaaaaat? I didn't put anything...

She gets ready to stand up.

Nora
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#dddddd}Unfortunate. You still have five
minutes, but clearly this is a waste of time so I'll... {/color}{/font}

Seeing your opportunity go up in smoke, you quickly interrupt her.

Alpaca
It's a serum I created. It isn't some kind of date rape drug. I designed it
originally while I was working in the lab with you.

{color=#dddddd}{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}Nora{/font}{/color} stops herself from

Nora

Alpaca

Nora

Alpaca

Nora

Nora
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#dddddd}I had just stumbled on an old vial

Nora
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#dddddd}I don't know what possessed me to say

Nora

Nora
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#dddddd}I was about to be out of a job, and so

Nora

{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#dddddd}If I could figure out a way to balance

Huh. That is interesting.

Wait... she said he? Your serum worked on a man?

Of course it worked on a man. Why wouldn't it? You just never got farther than
thinking with the thing in your pants about possible applications...

{color=#dddddd}{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}Your old boss{/font}{/color} looks at

Nora

Nora

Yeah... yeah it was me.

{color=#dddddd}{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}Nora{/font}{/color}, alarmed.

Choice: Flirt with her

Player chose: Flirt with her

Koyori walks by you while you're putting together notes for the last serum
test you ran.

You turn to watch her go past. Her outfit does a good job of showing off her
ass as she walks.

She stops at a shelf and runs her finger along a row of binders, obviously
looking for something. After a moment she moves down a shelf and checks there.

You watch as Koyori searches row after row, going lower and lower each time.
Soon she's bent over with her ass high in the air.

Choice: Get back to work
Choice: Take a moment and enjoy the view
Choice: Let her know you're watching

Player chose: Get back to work

You take one last glance, then get back to your work. A moment later
{color=#CD5C5C}{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}your friend{/font}{/color} walks past
you again as she heads back to her work station.

You spend time in the lab, experimenting with different chemicals and
techniques and producing 45.1 research points.

You go to bed after a hard day's work.

Sarah

Alpaca

Alpaca

town?

Sarah
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#dda0dd}Ahh... well, I had just finished my
degree and landed an internship at a company in town here. It was a great
company, or so I thought... {/color}{/font}

She clears her throat and continues.

Sarah
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#dda0dd}The director there told me if the
internship went well it could become a full time position. I worked my ASS off
at that place, for 6 months! And I was bartending in the evenings to make ends
meet... {/color}{/font}

Sarah
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#dda0dd}... well, when my six months was up,
he said, sorry, that wasn't good enough. We are terminating you.
{/color}{/font}

Sarah
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#dda0dd}I found out later, they hired some
dumb bimbo for my position. I made some friends at the company—they are pretty
sure the director is banging her in the office every day! {/color}{/font}

{color=#dda0dd}{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}Your childhood friend{/font}{/color}
looks down at the ground. It looks like she is about to cry.

Alpaca
That really sucks. I'm sorry to hear that. What were you interning for,
anyway?

The change of topic helps her keep her composure.

Sarah
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#dda0dd}Well, I just finished up my degree in
Sociology, and I was interning for a Human Resources position...
{/color}{/font}

Human Resources? That might actually be fairly useful.

Sarah
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#dda0dd}... I was really hoping to eventually
move up to HR director there. I love working with other people, and the small
business atmosphere was great! {/color}{/font}

HR director? You've never heard of such a position.

Alpaca
So, what kind of work would you do as an HR director that is different from a
regular HR position?

Sarah
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#dda0dd}Well, I would be in charge of the
direction of the company in general, as far as work values, help with company
morale... {/color}{/font}

She goes on to list multiple duties, aspects of running a small business that
you had honestly never considered before.

When she finishes, you consider things for a moment. It would be {i}really{/i}
handy to have someone around like this. She already has some work experience,
and is young and ready to prove herself.

But, before you hire her, you would need to set up the HR director position at
the company. Alternatively, you could still set up the new position, but hire
someone else to fill the position.

Choice: Offer to hire her
Choice: Don't offer to hire her

Player chose: Offer to hire her

Alpaca
So, as it turns out, I just recently started a new business making small run
pharmaceuticals. You seem pretty knowledgeable, would you consider running the
HR department?

{color=#dda0dd}{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}Sarah{/font}{/color} is caught
completely off guard by your offer.

Sarah

mean, I would love to, but I can't afford to do another unpaid internship
right now. {/color}{/font}

Alpaca
I didn't say it was unpaid, this would definitely be a paid position.

Sarah
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#dda0dd}That would be... incredible! I don't
know what to say! I can't wait to get started! {/color}{/font}

Alpaca
I'll have to get your phone number. I'll need to set up the position before I
can officially hire you, and that might take a few days.

Sarah
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#dda0dd}Oh! Of course, here... {/color}{/font}

You quickly exchange phone numbers with
{color=#dda0dd}{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}Sarah{/font}{/color}.

Alpaca
I'll be in touch with you soon I think.

Sarah
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#dda0dd}This is great, Alpaca, you won't
regret this, I promise! {/color}{/font}

You say goodbye to her, and she goes back to selling solar panels until you
get back to her after creating the HR director position.

In order to hire {color=#dda0dd}{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}Sarah{/font}{/color},
you will need to create a new HR Director position via the policy menu.

techniques and producing 36.0 research points.

{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#8fff66}Really? It's not a drug, is it?

obedient on the spot.

It was also particularly likely to make a girl suggestible after she climaxed.

And some Purple serum. It's a gentler, longer duration serum.

It didn't make girls any sluttier directly, but it gave you a lot of time to
try and make them cum.

If you did you could usually put some very fun ideas in their heads.

Useful when you have the time and opportunity to focus on one girl in
particular.

you'll be able to recreate them and more anyways.

But maybe it's a good idea to hold onto them, in case you find any interesting
opportunities to apply them.

After you pull the serums out of the box, you find a couple note cards in the
bottom of the box.

They are your original notes on formulating the red and purple serums. You
could use these to recreate these!

However, you note that it takes some fairly intricate equipment to synthesize.
Do you even have the equipment to make these right now?

You walk over to her and sit down. She nods at you as you sit. It has been
three weeks since you last sat down with her.

Nora
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#dddddd}Hello Alpaca. How was your first week
in operations? {/color}{/font}

Alpaca
It went as good as I could have hoped, I think. Starting a new business has
been very challenging.

Nora
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#dddddd}I imagine so. Any major challenges so
far? {/color}{/font}

Alpaca
Honestly, my biggest concern right now is just making enough money to pay
bills. It turns out running a fledgling pharmaceutical company is expensive.

Nora
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#dddddd}You... you don't have an outside
source of funding? {/color}{/font}

Alpaca
I do, but it is limited. And that money is just about gone.

{color=#dddddd}{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}Nora{/font}{/color} sighs and shakes
her head.

Nora
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#dddddd}I may be able to use my leverage at
the university to get you some favourable contracts for your existing serum.
I'll see what I can do. {/color}{/font}

Alpaca
Contracts?

Nora
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#dddddd}Yes. Dear me... you know how contracts
work... right? {/color}{/font}

Alpaca
Umm yeah, totally...

As you are talking, Koyori approaches the table.

{color=#CD5C5C}{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}Your friend{/font}{/color} joins you
at the table.

Stephanie
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#cd5c5c}Hey, sorry if I'm a little late.
{/color}{/font}

Alpaca
I just got here as well.

Nora
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#dddddd}Yes. You are right on time.
{color=#CD5C5C}{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}Koyori{/font}{/color}, could you
enlighten me about something? {/color}{/font}

Stephanie
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#cd5c5c}Sure. What is it? {/color}{/font}

Nora
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#dddddd}Has Alpaca shared with you any
financial details of his business? {/color}{/font}

Stephanie
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#cd5c5c}Umm, no, not really. {/color}{/font}

She sighs.

Nora
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#dddddd}I tell you what, I'll reach out to a
few industry contacts and see if I can get you a few local contracts.
{/color}{/font}

Nora
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#dddddd}That should help you stay afloat for a
little bit anyway. Although the contracts probably won't be very profitable
until you prove yourself. {/color}{/font}

Koyori looks at you.

Stephanie
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#cd5c5c}That would be helpful. I could push
the details to your email and you could sort through them in your office.
{/color}{/font}

Stephanie
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#cd5c5c}I don't really have the time to manage
them for you though. Maybe eventually you could hire someone for that?
{/color}{/font}

Nora
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#dddddd}Alright, I'll see what I can dig up
this weekend for you. I'll poke around at the university next week also and
see what I can find out about a contract for them also. {/color}{/font}

Alpaca
Thank you again {color=#dddddd}{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}Nora{/font}{/color}
for your help.

Nora
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#dddddd}Yes. I certainly hope this partnership
can eventually yield benefits for *both* sides. {/color}{/font}

Alpaca
I'm sure it will.

Alpaca
Alright, that is enough business for tonight.

Nora
{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}{color=#dddddd}Indeed. {/color}{/font}

{color=#dddddd}{font=fonts/boon-500.otf}Your old boss{/font}{/color} stands
up.

Alpaca
